p: The variant calling was carried out by the Variant Finder Tool (Geneious) filtering out variants with a p value greater than 0, using a minimum variant frequency of 0 and default parameters for Maximum Variant p-value (10 −6). The minimum sequencing coverage for each variant position was 10 reads. Variant’s frequencies were evaluated as a sum of variant frequencies at that position. Each sample was processed and analyzed in two independent experiments.
